Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or unstained tissue sections on charged slides
Purpose: To perform and document the Glutamine Synthetase immunostain in a standardized manner to ensure consistent, accurate, and reproducible staining results.
Container: FFPE tissue block or charged microscope slide
Equipment: Automated immunostainer (or manual staining setup), microtome, water bath, laboratory oven/slide warmer
